CustomField.formula: IF(MONTH(Birthdate)=2 && DAY(Birthdate)=29, IF(MONTH(Birthdate)>MONTH(TODAY()), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(Birthdate),28), IF(MONTH(Birthdate)<MONTH(TODAY()), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,MONTH(Birthdate),28), IF(DAY(Birthdate) >= (DAY(TODAY())), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(Birthdate)+1,1), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,MONTH(Birthdate),28)))) , IF(MONTH(Birthdate)>MONTH(TODAY()), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(Birthdate),DAY(Birthdate)), IF(MONTH(Birthdate)<MONTH(TODAY()), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,MONTH(Birthdate),DAY(Birthdate)), IF(DAY(Birthdate) >= (DAY(TODAY())), DATE(YEAR(TODAY()),MONTH(Birthdate),DAY(Birthdate)), DATE(YEAR(TODAY())+1,MONTH(Birthdate),DAY(Birthdate))))) )
CustomField.label: TECH_NextBirthday
